# aliases

**Instance Property**

The additional handles that Siri may use to identify the person.

## Declaration

```swift
var aliases: [INPersonHandle]? { get }
```

## Discussion

Each [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPersonHandle] in this property represents another way of identifying the user to your app. Person handles contain information such as phone numbers or email addresses that are unique to the user.

## Accessing the person’s identity

- **personHandle**: The unique handle that your app assigns to the person.
- **image**: An image of the person.
- **isMe**: A Boolean value indicating whether the person is the user of the device.
